headline: 3 Reasons HLT is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Since March 2025, Hilton has been in a holding pattern, posting a small return of 4.7% while floating around $276.06. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 10.5% gain during that period.
